name: Carlos & Maria Amorio - Toro
additionalNotes: Carlos & Maria Amorío, produced at the El Maestro factory in the Dominican Republic by Wiber Ventura, this regular production line features a blend that includes an Ecuadorian cigar seed wrap, a wrap of Sumatran seeds grown in Indonesia and a meticulously made filling. The mixture includes dry Nicaraguan, Ecuadorian Habano, Dominican San Vicente light and Creole 98 views of undisclosed origins, promising a captivating and attractive profile that will surely captivate fans.
